#summary This page provides a listing of Use Cases for the COLORE System.

= COLORE System Use Cases =

  * [UC9786]: Create a new CL text
  * [UC3467]: Retrieve a listing of all CL texts
  * [UC5377]: Retrieve most recent version of a CL text
  * [UC8204]: Retrieve a version of a CL text
  * [UC8388]: Delete all versions of a CL text
  * [UC9742]: Delete a version of a CL text
  * [UC2892]: Delete the most recent version of a CL text
